text: Ian Patrick 'Mac' McLagan ; (12 May 1945 â€“ 3 December 2014) was an English keyboard instrumentalist. He was best known as a member of the English Rock bands Small Faces and Faces. He also worked with The Rolling Stones and led his own band from the late 1970s. McLagan died on 3 December 2014, reportedly due to a massive stroke, in Austin, Texas aged 69.Ian McLagan 1945-2014, The Austin Chronicle, 3 December 2014 ==References== ==Other websites== *Ianmclagan.com official site *macspages.com official site Category:1945 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:English songwriters Category:Musicians from Middlesex
title: Ian McLagan
